promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute rare elephant fighting-type pokemon wearing a golden crystal headband. It can be found in ruins-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or elephant. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Elecrysta, a a chibi cute rare elephant fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in ruins-like environments It has the following abilities: Magnitude. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "elephant", "fighting" or "Elecrysta". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, elephant-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: In ancient ruins dwells the petite Elecrysta, a lovable pachyderm warrior. Its Magnitude powers cause tremors, playfully shaking the ground to clear paths.
